text: Gabrial "Gabe" McNair (born September 8, 1973) is an American musician and composer. He is a multi-instrumentalist. This means he plays many different instruments. Category:African-American musicians Category:No Doubt members Category:American punk musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American classical musicians Category:American saxophonists Category:Musicians from California Category:American rock guitarists Category:American drummers Category:1973 births Category:Living people
title: Gabrial McNair
